title: Battle Axe
desc:
Post 1929
- Input a 3 or lower to play this card.
- The next player draws cards equal to 2x the number of the die.
- Alternatively, may be used on a <:builder:1119843481700012103> card to deal one hit to it.
- This card will break any <:builder:1119843481700012103> card of the Wood subtype in one play.
